task.title: Save a Drawing
task.shortdesc: You save drawing files for later use just as you do with other Microsoft Windows applications. You can also set up automatic saving and backup files and save only selected objects.

context.p: The file extension for drawing files is ".dwg", and unless you change the default file format in which drawings are saved, drawings are saved in DWG2013 file format.

After you have saved your drawing for the first time, you can save it with a new name. In addition to drawing (.dwg) files, you can also save a drawing in a Drawing Exchange Format (.dxf) file or a drawing template (.dwt) file.
If you created your drawing using a template, saving the drawing does not alter the original template.
1. Choose File > Save from the main menu.

step.cmd: When you save a drawing the first time, the programdisplays the Save Drawing As dialog boxso that you can choose a directory and type a name for the drawing.
DWG 2018 format is perfectly compatible with ZWCAD now.
